ref.mixed-citation: Nakicenovic N, Alcamo J, Davis G, de Vries B, Fenhann J, Gaffin S, Dadi Z (2000) Emission scenarios IPCC special report on emission, scenarios special report of working group III of the intergovernmental panel on climate change.
